byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and ILEANA NAJARRO

abstract: New York City police say worker fell to his death in Midtown Manhattan elevator shaft after platform collapsed; full work stop order is issued, halting construction of planned 28-story tower.
lead_paragraph: The accident led city building officials to stop all work on a planned 28-story tower on Ninth Avenue near 42nd Street, where the accident occurred.

headline.main: Construction Worker Falls to His Death in Manhattan Elevator Shaft
headline.print_headline: Worker Falls to His Death in Midtown

snippet: The accident led city building officials to stop all work on a planned 28-story tower on Ninth Avenue near 42nd Street, where the accident occurred.
